suggestion.reasoning: Strategic suggestion based on multiple factors: 1) These cards haven't been definitively eliminated or shown in recent turns, 2) The Rope has been suggested multiple times without clear ownership, making it a potential solution card, 3) Colonel Mustard hasn't been confirmed in anyone's hand yet, 4) The Hall is a strategic room choice that hasn't been frequently tested, 5) This combination will help narrow down ownership of the Rope and Colonel Mustard cards while potentially eliminating the Hall if shown. The suggestion avoids using any of my known cards (Candlestick, Ballroom, Dining Room) to maximize information gain.

I only have certainty about my own cards (Candlestick, Ballroom, Dining Room) and those eliminated through suggestions. With the solution cards remaining unclear and the risk of elimination if wrong, it's too early to make an accusation.
